description: This is a C source file implementing functions for retrieving parameter values and instance numbers in a network management system, specifically within the Cosa framework for DSL home models. It references external APIs and defines functions related to getting ULONG, string, BOOL parameter values, and instance numbers by index.

methods.name: ULONG CosaGetParamValueUlong(char * pParamName)
methods.description: Retrieves a ULONG (unsigned long) parameter value by its name using an external global function and a global agent reference.

methods.name: int CosaGetParamValueString(char * pParamName,char * pBuffer,PULONG pulSize)
methods.description: Retrieves a string parameter value into a provided buffer, using an external global function and a global agent reference.

methods.name: BOOL CosaGetParamValueBool(char * pParamName)
methods.description: Retrieves a BOOL (boolean) parameter value by its name using an external global function and a global agent reference.

methods.name: ULONG CosaGetInstanceNumberByIndex(char * pObjName,ULONG ulIndex)
methods.description: Retrieves an instance number based on object name and index using an external global function and a global agent reference.
